channel.title: Windows Weekly (Video-HI)
channel.copyright: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons License - Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike - http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/
channel.itunes:author: TWiT
channel.itunes:subtitle: Each week, Windows expert Paul Thurrott of the SuperSite for Windows and Mary Jo Foley of All About Microsoft talk about Windows 8 and all things Microsoft.
channel.itunes:summary: A weekly look at all things Microsoft, including Windows, Windows Phone, Office, Xbox, and more, from two of the foremost Windows watchers in the world, Paul Thurrott of the Super Site for Windows and Mary Jo Foley of All About Microsoft. Records live at http://live.twit.tv/ every Wednesday at 11:00am PT/2:00pm ET.
channel.description: A weekly look at all things Microsoft, including Windows, Windows Phone, Office, Xbox, and more, from two of the foremost Windows watchers in the world, Paul Thurrott of the Super Site for Windows and Mary Jo Foley of All About Microsoft. Records live at http://live.twit.tv/ every Wednesday at 11:00am PT/2:00pm ET.
channel.itunes:keywords: TWiT, TechTV, Leo Laporte, Paul Thurrott, Mary Jo Foley, Windows, Microsoft, 7, Windows Weekly

item.title: WW 375: Use Your Selfie Stick
item.itunes:author: TWiT
item.author: leo@twit.tv (Leo Laporte)
item.description:
Hosts: Mary Jo Foley and Leo Laporte

Dissecting the Windows Phone 8.1 Update 1, Cortana could be part of Windows Threshold, Microsoft to drop support for older versions of IE and XBOX One holiday bundles revealed.

Guest: Daniel Rubino

Download or subscribe to this show at twit.tv/ww.

We invite you to read, add to, and amend our show notes.

Check out Mary Jo's blog at the AllAboutMicrosoft.com.

Thanks to Cachefly for the bandwidth for this show. The Windows Weekly theme music is courtesy of Derek K. Miller.

Running time: 1:49:29
